candidates.title: Release 4.3.5
candidates.body: [bot] Release wasmer version 4.3.5

candidates.title: Follow directory when deploying from create
candidates.body: As per title. Closes #4931

candidates.title: CLI: Add support for Secrets
candidates.body:
(Closes #4864). 
This PR adds subcommands to manage secrets in the `app` command: 
```
wasmer app secrets (create | update | list | reveal | delete)
```

candidates.title: Fix indirect call to dynamic imported function
candidates.body:
Fixes #4565.

The solution is to update the func_ptr of the anyfunc with the generated trampoline address during the resolve step. I'm not sure this is the best place for this code though; careful review is required.

candidates.title: Release 4.3.4
candidates.body: [bot] Release wasmer version 4.3.4

candidates.title: Compile `wasmer-api` crate to `wasm32-unknown-unknown`
candidates.body:
This patch resolves compiler errors arising when compiling the `wasmer-api` (a.k.a. `backend-api`) crate to `wasm32-unknown-unknown` targets. 

The main complication was the explicit use of a type (`Pin<Box<dyn Stream<Item = Result<Vec<DeployApp>, anyhow::Error>> + Send + Sync>>`) that required a `Sync` that was not available in `wasm32`.

candidates.title: Release 4.3.3
candidates.body: [bot] Release wasmer version 4.3.3

candidates.title: Re-use previously closed FDs
candidates.body:
This aligns with the Unix requirement that any newly returned FD must be the lowest unopened FD, and improves apps that use `select`, which only supports 1K FDs.

This PR also makes the FD table use ahash, which should be faster.

candidates.title: Replace mach with mach2
candidates.body:
Closes https://github.com/wasmerio/wasmer/issues/4222.

See #4250

candidates.title: Restore cursor after SIGINT during dialogue
candidates.body: As per title. This PR adds a `setup` function to `AsyncCliCommand` with a default implementation that installs a signal handler that restores the cursor (see https://github.com/console-rs/dialoguer/issues/77).  Solves #4837

candidates.title: Dynamically detect libgcc-vs-libunwind
candidates.body: An (in progress) fix for #4488

candidates.title: 4.3.2 post release
candidates.body: Minor fixes to some versions.

candidates.title: Release 4.3.2
candidates.body: [bot] Release wasmer version 4.3.2

candidates.title: Merge `ScopedDirectoryFileSystem` into `host_fs::Filesystem`
candidates.body:
This PR merges the protection logic of `ScopedDirectoryFileSystem` into `host_fs::Filesystem`.

Resolves #4723.

candidates.title: chore(cli): Update yanked `zip` version
candidates.body: Resolves #4807

candidates.title: CLI: app create - Template handling improvements
candidates.body:
Adds a local template cache (currently 15 minutes), and fetches more templates
from the backend, currently up to 100.

Also sorts the templates by popularity now.

NOTE: we should really use dialoger::FuzzySelect to give users a search prompt,
but that currently conflicts with the custom stylings of the select items and
messes up the formatting.
(See https://github.com/console-rs/dialoguer/issues/312)

Closes #4804

candidates.title: Multiple fixes for journaling with fast boot and resumption
candidates.body: These journal operations will now open an explicit file descriptor rather than renumbering one, this should prevent file descriptor overlap

candidates.title: Update the webc dependency
candidates.body: Resolves #4750.

candidates.title: Benchmarks: add new benchmark for function imports in modules
candidates.body: As per title.

candidates.title: Release 4.3.1
candidates.body: [bot] Release wasmer version 4.3.1

candidates.title: Argus: Compare v2 and v3 + add webhook message
candidates.body: This PR adds a new test in Argus, namely comparing webc v2 and webc v3 and a flag to specify a webhook to send a message once the test is finished.

candidates.title: New CLI integration tests
candidates.body:
Add integration tests for the *deploy* command
  - Deploy a PHP app, check w/ random query param
  - Deploy a JS app, check w/ random query param
  - Deploy an Axum server, check w/ random query param
  - Deploy a static website, check w/ random contents

..and *create* command
  - Create a new app from an existing package (wasmer/hello)
  - Create a new app from a template (static-website)

candidates.title: Add libc dep to workspace dependency
candidates.body: This PR adds `libc` as a workspace dependency and downgrades the version to `0.2.153` since `0.2.154` is yanked.

candidates.title: Remove `clock_time_get` instrumentation
candidates.body:
This PR reverts the instrumentation added to `clock_time_get` since it proved to add too much noise to the logs. Also, it adds an explanation as to why this syscall does not have an instrumentation.

Although it may help debugging some scenarios, especially in case of clock related bugs (see #4682), it makes debugging other scenarios more difficult since it clutters the logs.

candidates.title: Use registry templates to create new app
candidates.body: As per title, this PR removes the old templating mechanism and institutes a new one using the registry templates, solving #4578. Mandatory screenshot: Side quests: - Passes the owner information from `wasmer deploy` to `wasmer app create` (solves #4701) - Correctly serializes the package information when creating from an existing manifest (solves #4674) - Implicitly solves #4605, but introduces a potentially breaking change: `new-package-name` is not used anymore and, as of now, the `static-website` template is not available from the registry (with that name, at least).
